item.title: Help with forms
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Because you never increase Chops or Loads
Chops := Chops + 5;
Increases the amount you’ve chopped by 5, place something like this in your script and try it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with forms
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

MakeCompass sets the compass direction…I’m not entirely sure whether its working atm or not because I heard that rs_GetMinimapCompasAngle isnt working properly but when it does use MakeCompass to make the compass face either ‘N’, ‘E’, ‘S’ or ‘W’

Read full topic

@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

thanks a lot that realy helped ive been on for hours trying too find out whats rong when its so simple im such an idiot lol anyway ill fix up those bugs and i noticed something was rong with my droping procedure just didnt know what again thanks heaps youve helped lots
btw id like to know ho to get the compass angle to face a different way if theres anyone that con help me with this its you

item.title: Help with forms
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]//script only cuts oak
//have runescape map/veiw at it highest point facing north
//stand behind lumbridge general store
//see http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187285.msg1691689.html#new
//for picture
//power cutter by jason aka sonny bill 9
//setup
//drag cross hair onto rs screen
//press play
//login cut and drop
program autocutter;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

var
Chops, Loads: Integer;
// InitForm variables.
EndInitForm : Boolean;
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
Username: string;
password: string;
procedure login;
begin
Movemousesmooth(468, 291);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(468, 291,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(468, 291,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(username,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(347, 276);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(347, 276,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(347, 276,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(password,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(331, 320);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(331, 320,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(331, 320,true);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(398, 344);
wait(7000);
holdmouse(398, 344,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(398, 344,true);
wait(3000);
end;

procedure drop;
begin
gametab(4);
status(‘Dropping’);
if (invfull = true) then
mousespeed:=1;
dropto(1,28);
wait(2000+random(550));
end;

procedure cut;
begin
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
repeat until(false)
end;
procedure Report;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’<thank you sonny bill 9s powerchopper >’);
Writeln(‘Worked for ’ + TimeRunning);
Writeln(‘you have done’ + IntToStr(Loads) + ’ loads.’);
Writeln(‘you have cut’ + IntToStr(chops) + ‘logs.’);
end;

// When the form is closed, this code will be executed.
procedure InitFormOnClose(Sender : TObject; var Action : TCloseAction);
begin
if(not(frmDesign.ModalResult = 1))then
EndInitForm := True;
Username := Edit1.Text;
Password := Edit2.Text;
end;

// This form was parsed using: DFM Form Parser v.22 by Ron.
procedure InitForm;
var
TimeInitForm : Integer;
begin
TimeInitForm := GetSystemTime;
frmDesign := CreateForm;
with frmDesign do
begin
OnClose := @InitFormOnClose;
Position := poScreenCenter;
BorderStyle := bsSingle;
BorderIcons := [biMinimize,biSystemMenu];
FormStyle := fsStayOnTop;
Caption := ‘SONNY BILL 9S OAK AUTOCUTTER!!!’;
ClientHeight := 261;
ClientWidth := 511;
Color := clBlue;
Font.Color := clWindowText;
Font.Height := -11;
Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Font.Style := [];
PixelsPerInch := 96;
end;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
with Label1 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 58;
Top := 111;
Width := 211;
Height := 24;
Caption := ‘type your username here’;
Font.Color := clWindowText;
Font.Height := -19;
Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Font.Style := [];
ParentFont := False;
end;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
with Label2 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 59;
Top := 146;
Width := 207;
Height := 24;
Caption := ‘type your password here’;
Font.Color := clWindowText;
Font.Height := -19;
Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Font.Style := [];
ParentFont := False;
end;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
with Label3 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 61;
Top := 16;
Width := 401;
Height := 44;
Hint := ‘ehh the name …man your dumb’;
Caption := ’ SONNY BILL 9S AUTOCUTTER ';
Color := clWindowFrame;
Font.Color := clYellow;
Font.Height := -37;
Font.Name := ‘Freestyle Script’;
Font.Style := [fsBold];
ParentColor := False;
ParentFont := False;
end;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
with Edit1 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 276;
Top := 114;
Width := 121;
Height := 21;
TabOrder := 8;
Text := ‘username’;
end;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
with Edit2 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 276;
Top := 146;
Width := 121;
Height := 21;
TabOrder := 9;
Text := ‘password’;
end;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
with Button1 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 218;
Top := 202;
Width := 75;
Height := 25;
Caption := ‘start script!’;
ModalResult := 1;
TabOrder := 10;
end;
WriteLn(‘InitForm compiled in ’ + IntToStr(GetSystemTime - TimeInitForm) + ’ milliseconds!’);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
V : TVariantArray;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, V);
end;

procedure ShowInitFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowInitFormModal;
var
V : TVariantArray;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowInitFormModal’, V);
end;

procedure MainInitForm;
begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowInitFormModal;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
MainInitForm;
if(EndInitForm)then
TerminateScript;
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
login;
cut;
if (invfull) then
drop;
report;
repeat until(false)
end.[/code]

It’s good to see you’re using SRL, But you aren’t using it to its full potential
SRL’s Mouse moving procedures are a lot less detectable but its good to see you know how to use InvFull, TypeSend, GameTab and IsUpTextMulti. DropTo isnt part of SRL anymore by the way. Your cutting procedure could use a little work, eg. repeat CutOneTreeAtATime Until(InvFull) also I noticed in your dropping procedure you have it check if your inventory is full and then it changes the mousespeed and drops, You forgot a begin and end so it will drop even if the inventory isnt full, I don’t know whether it is suppose to or not though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

thanks ill try asap[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 04:35:43 AM[/size][hr]EDIT:compiling error

Line 28: [Error] (14842:15): colon (':') expected in script

changed script:

[code]//script only cuts oak
//have runescape map/veiw at it highest point facing north
//stand behind lumbridge general store
//see http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187285.msg1691689.html#new

{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

var
Chops, Loads: Integer;
// InitForm variables.
EndInitForm : Boolean;
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
UsernameString:= UsernameTextField.Text;
passwordstring:= passwordtextfield.text;
procedure login;
begin
Movemousesmooth(468, 291);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(468, 291,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(468, 291,true);

releasemouse(347, 276,true);

wait(1000);

wait(100);
releasemouse(331, 320,true);

end;

procedure drop;
begin
gametab(4);
status(‘Dropping’);
if (invfull = true) then
mousespeed:=1;
dropto(1,28);
wait(2000+random(550));
end;

procedure cut;
begin
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
repeat until(false)
end;
procedure Report;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’<thank you sonny bill 9s powerchopper >’);
Writeln(‘Worked for ’ + TimeRunning);
Writeln(‘you have done’ + IntToStr(Loads) + ’ loads.’);
Writeln(‘you have cut’ + IntToStr(chops) + ‘logs.’);
end;

// When the form is closed, this code will be executed.
procedure InitFormOnClose(Sender : TObject; var Action : TCloseAction);
begin
if(not(frmDesign.ModalResult = 1))then
EndInitForm := True;
end;

// This form was parsed using: DFM Form Parser v.22 by Ron.
procedure InitForm;
var
TimeInitForm : Integer;
begin
TimeInitForm := GetSystemTime;
frmDesign := CreateForm;
with frmDesign do
begin
OnClose := @InitFormOnClose;
Position := poScreenCenter;
BorderStyle := bsSingle;
BorderIcons := [biMinimize,biSystemMenu];
FormStyle := fsStayOnTop;
Caption := ‘SONNY BILL 9S OAK AUTOCUTTER!!!’;
ClientHeight := 261;
ClientWidth := 511;
Color := clBlue;
Font.Color := clWindowText;

Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);

begin
Parent := frmDesign;

Caption := ‘type your username here’;

Height := 44;
Hint := ‘ehh the name …man your dumb’;
Caption := ’ SONNY BILL 9S AUTOCUTTER ';

Font.Color := clYellow;

SetUpSRL;

if (invfull) then

but thanks anyway you seem to know what your doing

oh and could you post the full script with the edits that would help because its my first time working with forms i wouldnt need you to do this if it was something else

thanks again for trying
sonny bill 9

item.title: Help with forms
item.dc:creator: @Penguins Penguins
item.description:
@Penguins wrote:

So you want to change you’re username & password Strings in the code to whatever the user puts in?

Right now, you have the username & password Strings as constants, and cannot be changed. You’ll need to switch them over to variables to change them to whatever the user puts in the two text fields.

Then you’ll use…

UsernameString := UsernameTextField.Text

or something to get whatever is in the Edit Box.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with forms
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

thanks to rons form paraser (duno if thats spelt right) i made my self a form for my script but there is one problem that some one more experienced in scripting than me could help with… the problem is that i want to make the username/password slot in the forms change the username/ password in the script so the setup is in the form here is the script[code]//script only cuts oak
//have runescape map/veiw at it highest point facing north
//stand behind lumbridge general store
//see http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187285.msg1691689.html#new
//for picture
//power cutter by jason aka sonny bill 9
//setup
//drag cross hair onto rs screen
//press play
//login cut and drop
program autocutter;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}
const
username =’’; //add your username
password =’’; //add your password
var
Chops, Loads: Integer;
// InitForm variables.
EndInitForm : Boolean;
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
procedure login;
begin
Movemousesmooth(468, 291);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(468, 291,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(468, 291,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(username,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(347, 276);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(347, 276,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(347, 276,true);
wait(1000);
sendkeyswait(password,400,100);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(331, 320);
wait(1000);
holdmouse(331, 320,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(331, 320,true);
wait(1000);
Movemousesmooth(398, 344);
wait(7000);
holdmouse(398, 344,true);
wait(100);
releasemouse(398, 344,true);
wait(3000);
end;

procedure drop;
begin
gametab(4);
status(‘Dropping’);
if (invfull = true) then
mousespeed:=1;
dropto(1,28);
wait(2000+random(550));
end;

procedure cut;
begin
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(233, 216)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(1000)
clickmouse(233,216,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(255, 14)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
wait(3000)
holdmouse(255, 14,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(255, 14,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
movemousesmooth(274, 320)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
holdmouse(274, 320,true)
wait(100)
releasemouse(274, 320,true)
wait(20000)//time it takes to chop the tree in miliseconds
repeat until(false)
end;
procedure Report;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’<thank you sonny bill 9s powerchopper >’);
Writeln(‘Worked for ’ + TimeRunning);
Writeln(‘you have done’ + IntToStr(Loads) + ’ loads.’);
Writeln(‘you have cut’ + IntToStr(chops) + ‘logs.’);
end;

// When the form is closed, this code will be executed.
procedure InitFormOnClose(Sender : TObject; var Action : TCloseAction);
begin
if(not(frmDesign.ModalResult = 1))then
EndInitForm := True;
end;

// This form was parsed using: DFM Form Parser v.22 by Ron.
procedure InitForm;
var
TimeInitForm : Integer;
begin
TimeInitForm := GetSystemTime;
frmDesign := CreateForm;
with frmDesign do
begin
OnClose := @InitFormOnClose;
Position := poScreenCenter;
BorderStyle := bsSingle;
BorderIcons := [biMinimize,biSystemMenu];
FormStyle := fsStayOnTop;
Caption := ‘SONNY BILL 9S OAK AUTOCUTTER!!!’;
ClientHeight := 261;
ClientWidth := 511;
Color := clBlue;
Font.Color := clWindowText;
Font.Height := -11;
Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Font.Style := [];
PixelsPerInch := 96;
end;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
with Label1 do
begin
Parent := frmDesign;
Left := 58;
Top := 111;
Width := 211;
Height := 24;
Caption := ‘type your username here’;
Font.Color := clWindowText;
Font.Height := -19;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
V : TVariantArray;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, V);
end;

procedure ShowInitFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowInitFormModal;
var
V : TVariantArray;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowInitFormModal’, V);
end;

procedure MainInitForm;
begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowInitFormModal;
FreeForm(frmDesign);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
MainInitForm;
if(EndInitForm)then
TerminateScript;
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
login;
cut;
if (invfull) then
drop;
report;
repeat until(false)
end.[/code]
